body: Okay, first of all I call bullshit on the fact that the wiile ship can kill off zeruel the strongest angel by a huge margin so eaily when none of the eva or human weapons could even touch it, only EVA 1 awakened could kill it, i doubt that a ship with a dormant eva could kill off the fucker, then there is the story its abvious that whatever script Kimigabuchi had planned was trow out of the window after the last movie came out, pacing and story wise this one is a mess that is hard to follow, the eye patch versions of shinji and asuka are looking for newer version of themsevles in other universes, why? who knows... I hate the fact that this is linked to the original Retake, it had a perfect ending, there is no need to shit all over with it with this sequel, Hot take but i think a new Retake should have focus on a new girl, make Retake Kai about either Rei or Mari, asuka story was resolved with the original Retake.
(ಠ_ಠ) Asushin niggas really be wilin sometimes

Selfcest best -cest. Also very nice work. Studio Kimigabuchi remains as a titan of serious Doujin-storytelling. Wish more artist would do so, afterall not only the dick but also brain and heart are in need for some satisfaction from time to time.
